Subject: Re: Enter Killfest
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Wildrider quickly stands up after beeing plowed "I crossed the finish line
first you pure excuse for a Volkswagon" he snears sharply than starts to
cackle. "Boy, this sure beats being locked up anyday, Yahooo" then his
pleasured face is quickly replaced with a grim look. "Okay though, we
should watch our buddy Astro-Train to make sure nothing odd happens, I dont
trust those ugly looking robots". With that he hunches behind the fallen
tree and presses a button which opens his wrist up to reveal a small
satalite type dish. Then the voices of Astro-Train and his entourage become
evident.
